songs.title: True Love
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
I think about you all the time
One look, my knees get weak
Practically die
So hard to sleep
When I'm so close to this dream coming true
True, true
How do I tell, tell you when?

[Chorus]
I can't speak, I am terrified
'Cause if I say the wrong thing
You might see how hard I'm trying
Is this made up or true love?
Is this true love? Is this true love?

[Verse 2]
Walk by and I'm a nervous wreck
The way you smell, the way you dress (it's so perfect)
My tongue is tied 'cause I can't
Translate these feelings inside, ide, ide, oh

[Chorus]
I can't speak, I am terrified
'Cause if I say the wrong thing
You might see how hard I'm trying
Is this made up or true love?
Is this true love? Is this true love?

[Bridge]
I want to tell you my secrets
I'll tell you everything
My heart is racing
I'm waiting for some sign from you
How do I say it to my true love? (True love)
Tell me you feel it too, my true love (true love)

[Chorus]
I can't speak, I am terrified
'Cause if I say the wrong thing
You might see how hard I'm trying
Is this made up or true love?
Is this true love? Is this true love?
